Package simplenlg.orthography

The orthography package contains the processing module that handles the orthography in the SimpleNLG package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OrthographyProcessor
    This processing module deals with punctuation when applied to DocumentElements.

Package simplenlg.orthography Description

The orthography package contains the processing module that handles the orthography in the SimpleNLG package. Orthography deals with the punctation of text. Currently SimpleNLG comes with a basic orthography processor for English.
